__e: I sing damn good, if you must know, but I started off wrong,... ..working with a cheap band in some crummy cellar.
She was upset after failing the exam... for the university orchestra.
All that cash is for the Troubled Youth Orchestra?
I spoke with some of the other men and musicians and they too would really like to do something, just like us.
It's my first time being there in an orchestra, and it was-- it was an experience.
But I'm the conductor, and I must have some distance.
